description: Part single part two storey rear extension, two storey extensions to the front & side. Proposed new roof with rear dormer & rooflights to accommodate conversion of the roof space for habitable use with internal alterations to property including conversion of garage.
decision_conditions: The proposed first floor rear extension by virtue of its height, depth, scale and proximity to the shared boundary with No.10 Elmdene Avenue would appear as a dominant, overbearing and intrusive development.  The harm on neighbouring amenity is considered significant, therefore the proposal is contrary to Policy 7 of the Havering Local Plan 2016 and Havering's Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD (2011).

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, notification of intended refusal and the reason(s) for it was given to the agent via email on 30/04/2025.
